mapper.insert: insert into chat_message (session_id, sender_type, content, msg_type, create_time) values (#{sessionId}, #{senderType}, #{content}, #{msgType}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update consultation_session
user_id = #{userId},
doctor_id = #{doctorId},
status = #{status},
ai_summary = #{aiSummary},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT cs.id, cs.status, cs.ai_summary, cs.create_time, cs.doctor_id, doc.real_name AS doctorName, doc.avatar AS doctorAvatar, doc.title, dept.name AS deptName FROM consultation_session cs LEFT JOIN doctor doc ON cs.doctor_id = doc.id LEFT JOIN department dept ON doc.dept_id = dept.id WHERE cs.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cs.update_time DESC
